analysis: Market analysis indicates balanced conditions with no clear directional bias. RSI at 45.99 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 36.76 suggests balanced volume distribution. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 90.70 warns of overbought exhaustion.
